result.markdown: --- title: "Week 4: Simple forecasting methods" --- ::: {.cell} ::: ## What you will learn this week * Forecasting workflow * Four benchmark forecasting methods that we will use for comparison * Linear trends, dummy seasonality * Forecasting with transformations * Forecasting with decompositions ## Pre-class activities * Read [Chapter 5 of the textbook](https://otexts.com/fpp3/toolbox.html), Sections 5.1 -- 5.3, 5.6 -- 5.7, and watch all embedded videos * Read [Chapter 7.4 of the textbook](https://otexts.com/fpp3/useful-predictors.html), and watch the embedded video ## Exercises (on your own or in tutorial) * Complete Exercises 1-5, 11 from [Section 5.11 of the book](https://otexts.com/fpp3/toolbox-exercises.html). * Complete Exercises 2 and 6 from [Section 7.10 of the book](https://otexts.com/fpp3/regression-exercises.html) * [Solutions to Exercises](ex4-sol.qmd) * [Recorded tutorial code](tutorial_code.R) ## Monday lecture Download slides [Code used in lecture](lecture4.R) ## Tuesday workshop [Activities for Tuesday workshop](activities.qmd) [Code used in workshop](workshop_code.R) ## Assignments * [Assignment 1](../assignments/A1.qmd) is due on Friday 28 March. ## Weekly quiz * [Week 4 quiz](https://learning.monash.edu/mod/quiz/view.php?id=3868369) is due on Sunday 30 March.
